description:
Edwin Fischer was an Alliance vice admiral who was known for his role as a close associate of http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli], being an expert in ship manoeuvres and credited with being able to effectively carry out Yang`s tactics by coordinating precise fleet movements. He served as the vice commander of the Yang Fleet due to his abilities in coordinating ship movements.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Edwin Fischer
